com.gushikustudios.rube

Class RubeScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gushikustudios.rube.RubeScene

  • public class RubeScene
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple encapsulation of a World. Plus the data needed to run the simulation.

    • Field Summary

      Iteration steps done in the simulation to calculates positions

      Iteration steps done in the simulation to calculates velocities
